[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1603042832296{padding-top: 260px !important;padding-bottom: 200px !important;background-image: url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/1-3-1.jpg?id=8416) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” top_section_title=”” bottom_section_title=””][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1513003956648{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″ css=”.vc_custom_1513004658055{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1513008591637{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Social Events” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:85|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Great%20Vibes%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” kd_fixed_background=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1602963146998{background: #ffffff url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/1-1.jpg?id=8037) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”What are Social Events?” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_empty_space height=”15px”][vc_column_text]

Different Social Institutions and Communities fulfill their social responsibilities by organizing various kinds of social events to allow members to interact with each other and develop socially concerning relation building. Social Event resembles a cakewalk because any error in handling any social occasions can lead to a lot of criticism for society and management, which sometimes becomes a sensitive issue. Therefore, Events such as these must be well handled, Procedural and backed up with all appropriate documentation. Considering these factors and situations in mind, Many social institutions and communities need their Event to be extra creative and innovative. It contributes to the additional engagement of their society members, and the event is memorable.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”8323″ img_size=”1200*700″ alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_border” border_color=”black” onclick=”link_image” css_animation=”fadeInLeft”][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” kd_fixed_background=”true” kd_image_overlay=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1602963179632{background-image: url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/119627-white-and-gold-abstract-background-image.jpg?id=7867) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”8324″ img_size=”1200*700″ style=”vc_box_border_circle” border_color=”black” onclick=”link_image” css_animation=”fadeInLeft”][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Why Archi Events ?” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60|text_align:center” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInLeft”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInLeft”]

The Experienced and mature management of Archi Events properly understands this requirement of Social Events, and it also understands the importance of managing the program with zero error. With fresh ideas and innovative planning, Archi Events and its top-notch management skill work these events efficiently.  Archi Events properly understands the requirement through brief discussion, proper planning, and carries out the event along with highly skilled technical staff and personal supervision under any budget, time, location constraints professionally.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” kd_fixed_background=”true” kd_image_overlay=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1602963207400{background: #ffffff url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/abstract-wave-background-soft-design_41084-386.jpg?id=7985) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Type of Social Events” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60|text_align:center|color:%230a0a0a” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInLeft”]

  • डांडिया
  • फागोत्सव व होली मिलन समारोह
  • खेल – कूद आयोजन
  • दशहरा मेला
  • हॉबी क्लासेज
  • लहरिया उत्सव
  • सावन की गौठ
  • नव वर्ष समारोह
  • सम्मान समारोह
  • वैवाहिक परिचय सम्मलेन
  • शपथ गृहण समारोह
  • हेल्थ टॉक एवं सेमीनार
  • अग्रसेन जयन्ती समारोह
  • निशुल्क चिकित्सा शिविर
  • दीपावली स्नेह मिलन व अन्नकूट समारोह

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_single_image image=”8325″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_border” border_color=”black” onclick=”link_image” css_animation=”fadeInRight”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” kd_fixed_background=”true” kd_image_overlay=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1602963230004{background: #ffffff url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/abstract-white-triangle-shapes-background_1035-17544.jpg?id=8298) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_single_image image=”8326″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_border” border_color=”black” onclick=”link_image” css_animation=”fadeInLeft”][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Services we Provide” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60|text_align:center|color:%230a0a0a” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text]

  • Anchor
  • Sound System
  • Entertainment Artist
  • Security Arrangements
  • Photography
  • Catering & Food Preparation
  • Tent & Decoration
  • Venue Arrangements
  • Support in Hypothesis
  • Faculty Arrangements
  • And Many More Services………

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
